prompts: Create a unique electric-type Pokemon that resembles a small zebra with bright blue eyes.

Generate an adorable quadruped Pokemon with striking yellow accents and a playful demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that lives in urban environments and has a striking lightning bolt pattern.

Make a Pokemon that has a sleek body shape and is known for its agility in battles.
